main event: An object appeared on ground radar at Hereford Inlet, moving and disappearing from the screen without any visual sighting.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 10 minutes,The object was detected offshore without any visual confirmation,The report was part of Project Blue Book,The object was detected at a course of 020 degrees,The sighting was validated with no further data for a valid conclusion.
sighted object: an unidentified object on ground radar
witness description: No visual sighting by persons in the area.
